headline: Texas Instruments in advanced talks to buy Silicon Laboratories for about $7 billion, FT reports
summary: Texas Instruments is in advanced talks to buy chip ​designer Silicon Laboratories for about $7 ‌billion, the Financial Times reported on Tuesday.  Shares of Silicon ‌Laboratories, which has a market capitalization of about $4.71 billion, surged ‍28% after the bell following the report, while Texas Instruments shares were down 1%.  Texas ‌Instruments and Silicon Laboratories did not immediately respond to Reuters requests for comment.

headline: Jim Cramer on Texas Instruments: “I Think It’s Really Worth Watching”
summary: Texas Instruments Incorporated (NASDAQ:TXN) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shed light on recently. headline: Texas Instruments Stock: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish?
summary: As Texas Instruments has outpaced the S&P 500 over the past year, Wall Street analysts maintain a moderately optimistic outlook about the stock’s prospects.

headline: The Top 5 Analyst Questions From Texas Instruments’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Texas Instruments delivered year-over-year revenue growth in Q4, driven primarily by a rebound in industrial and continued momentum in data center applications. Management highlighted that industrial revenue rose nearly 20% over the prior year, while the data center segment posted around 70% growth, underscoring a shift toward higher-value markets. CEO Haviv Ilan explained, “The overall semiconductor market recovery is continuing, and we are well-positioned with inventory and capacity to meet im
